codeGet:
select * from (
select id, CONSTANT_NAME AS NAME,nvl(PAGE_OWNER,' ') as TYPE_OWNER, 'P' AS SOURCE_TYPE FROM page 
union
select id, SERVICE_NAME as NAME, nvl(VIRTUAL_DOMAIN_OWNER,' ') AS TYPE_OWNER , 'V' AS SOURCE_TYPE from virtual_domain
union
select id , CONSTANT_NAME AS NAME,nvl(CSS_OWNER,' ') AS OWNER, 'C' AS SOURCE_TYPE from css ) WHERE 
SOURCE_TYPE = :type and upper(NAME) like upper(decode(:name,'',NAME,:name)) 
and upper(TYPE_OWNER) like upper(decode(:owner,'',TYPE_OWNER,:owner)) order by NAME
